item.title: Bangalore to Pondicherry Solo Trip plan
item.description: Two to Three days trip from Bangalore to Pondicherry, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this two to three days plan works very well. Among the touristers Pondicherry is famous for its rich French essence of architecture of buildings in the White town area. Also it's famous for beaches and it's one of the good places for Solo travelers. Let&#3
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
